sensortoolkit._reference.import_airnowtech.Flatten¶

Flatten(list_of_lists)[source]¶

Function for flattening a nested list of values.

Parameters

list_of_lists (list) – A nested list, example: [‘a’, [‘b’, ‘c’]]

Returns

A flattened list, example: [‘a’, ‘b’, ‘c’]

Return type

flat_list (list)

sensortoolkit
